title: Resetting the date and time after reinserting the battery
answer:
For phones with a removable battery, the phone's main board may have insufficient power when there is no battery inserted. This means that the date will be incorrect when the phone is turned on after reinserting the battery. Please reset the date and time manually. 

 It is recommended that you use network values. After connecting to a network, the phone will automatically sync the date and time with the network values. 

 Go to Settings, select Date and time and enable Automatic date & time and Automatic time zone. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=96894)

 Some regions or phone models may not support the automatic date and time function.
keywords: change battery, reinsert battery, turn on, reset, reconfigure, date, time, reset to default
